title: General Disclosures: Company Profile
description: Overview of company's identity, structure, and operational footprint. Legal name, headquarters location, ownership structure, business activities, and geographic scope.

disclosures.title: Entities included in company's sustainability reporting
disclosures.description: List of all entities included in sustainability reporting

disclosures.title: External assurance
disclosures.description: Company's policy and practice for seeking external assurance, external climate change policies or goals

title: General Disclosures: Governance Structure and Composition
description: The structure, composition, and functioning of the highest governance body. Details about roles, committees, and leadership positions. How responsibilities are delegated across governance layers, and how sustainability-related oversight is integrated.

disclosures.title: Governance structure and composition
disclosures.description: Company's governance structure, including committees of the highest governance body

disclosures.title: Delegation of responsibility for managing impacts
disclosures.description: How company delegates responsibility for managing impacts on the economy, environment, and people

title: General Disclosures: Ethics and Integrity
description: Company's ethical foundations and how it embeds its values into day-to-day operations. Disclosures on policy commitments to human rights, anti-corruption, environmental protection.

disclosures.title: Policy commitments
disclosures.description: Company's policy commitments for responsible business conduct

disclosures.title: Embedding policy commitments
disclosures.description: How company embeds policy commitments for responsible business conduct throughout activities and business relationships

title: General Disclosures: Strategy, Risk, and Stakeholder Engagement
description: Company's sustainability strategy, approach to managing environmental and social impacts, and interaction with stakeholders. Statements of strategic intent on sustainable development, mechanisms for addressing grievances, procedures for identifying and remediating negative impacts, and how company ensures legal and regulatory compliance.

disclosures.title: Statement on sustainable development strategy and climate goals
disclosures.description: Statement from the highest governance body about the relevance of sustainable development and strategy for contributing to sustainable development

disclosures.title: Processes to remediate negative impacts (climate change adaptation)
disclosures.description: Company's commitments to provide for or cooperate in the remediation of negative impacts that it has caused or contributed to

disclosures.title: Compliance with laws and regulations
disclosures.description: Total number of significant instances of non-compliance with laws and regulations during the reporting period

disclosures.title: Membership associations (industry peers)
disclosures.description: Industry associations, other membership associations in which company participates

disclosures.title: Approach to stakeholder engagement
disclosures.description: Process for identifying relevant stakeholders across its value chain and how it considers their needs in decision-making

title: Economic Performance
description: How company generates and distributes economic value, particularly in terms of its financial performance, economic impact on stakeholders, and resilience to risks such as climate change. Core financial disclosure codes like revenues, operating costs.

disclosures.title: Direct economic value generated and distributed
disclosures.description: Direct economic value (revenue) company generates

disclosures.title: Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change
disclosures.description: Risks and opportunities posed by climate change that have the potential to generate substantive changes in operations, revenue, or expenditure

title: Materials
description: How company uses raw and processed materials, with a focus on sustainability. Quantities of materials used, the proportion from recycled or renewable sources, and efforts to reduce material intensity. This disclosure helps assess a company's resource efficiency and its contribution to circular economy practices.

disclosures.title: Materials used by weight or volume
disclosures.description: Total weight of materials that are used to produce and package company's primary products and services

disclosures.title: Recycled input materials used
disclosures.description: Quantities of materials used, the proportion from recycled

disclosures.title: Reclaimed products and their packaging materials
disclosures.description: Products and their packaging materials sold by company that are reclaimed

title: Energy
description: Company's energy consumption and efficiency across operations. Initiatives made by company to reduce energy consumption and shift to renewable energy sources.

disclosures.title: Energy consumption within company
disclosures.description: Company's energy consumption (renewable and non-renewable sources)

disclosures.title: Energy consumption outside company
disclosures.description: Total amount of energy consumption outside of company

disclosures.title: Energy intensity
disclosures.description: Energy intensity ratio for company

disclosures.title: Reduction of energy consumption
disclosures.description: Initiatives made by company to reduce energy consumption

disclosures.title: Reductions in energy requirements of products and services
disclosures.description: Reduction in energy requirements of company's products and services

title: Water and Effluents
description: Company's water withdraws, water sources, sustainability of withdrawals, water recycling, and effluent treatment. Report on potential water stress regions and how water-related risks are managed, especially in water-intensive sectors.

disclosures.title: Interactions with water as a shared resource
disclosures.description: How and where water is withdrawn, consumed, and discharged, and water-related impacts company contributed to

disclosures.title: Management of water discharge-related impacts
disclosures.description: Minimum standards set for the quality of effluent discharge

disclosures.title: Water withdrawal
disclosures.description: How much water company withdraw

disclosures.title: Water discharge
disclosures.description: Total water discharge to all areas

disclosures.title: Water consumption
disclosures.description: Volume of water consumed by company

title: Biodiversity
description: Company's operations effect on ecosystems and species. Impacts on protected or sensitive habitats, species extinction risks, and actions to minimize biodiversity loss.

disclosures.title: Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas
disclosures.description: All locations (owned and controlled) where company conducts activities

disclosures.title: Significant impacts of activities, products, and services on biodiversity
disclosures.description: Company's impact on biodiversity and management plan

disclosures.title: Habitats protected or restored
disclosures.description: Species populations existing in or adjacent to company own locations

disclosures.title: Affected IUCN Red List and Conservation List Species
disclosures.description: Number of Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by company's operations

title: Emissions
description: Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from company's operations. Direct emissions (Scope 1), indirect energy-related emissions (Scope 2), and value chain emissions (Scope 3). Report emission trends, reduction efforts, and intensity metrics.

disclosures.title: Direct greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions (Scope 1)
disclosures.description: Company's Scope 1 greenhouse gas emissions

disclosures.title: Indirect greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions (Scope 2)
disclosures.description: Company's Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions

disclosures.title: Indirect greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions (Scope 3)
disclosures.description: Company's Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions

disclosures.title: GHG emissions intensity
disclosures.description: GHG emissions intensity ratio for company

disclosures.title: Reduction of GHG emissions
disclosures.description: Company's emission reduction efforts

title: Effluents and Waste
description: Volume, type, and destination of waste generated by a company. Waste treatment methods (landfill, recycling, incineration), and efforts to reduce waste generation. Downstream waste impacts and circular economy strategies.

disclosures.title: Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts
disclosures.description: Wsaste generated by company

disclosures.title: Management of significant waste related impacts
disclosures.description: Waste treatment methods and efforts to reduce waste generation

disclosures.title: Waste generated
disclosures.description: Total amount of waste generated by company

title: Environmental Compliance
description: Company compliance with environmental laws and regulations. Significant fines, non-monetary sanctions, or legal actions related to environmental non-compliance.

disclosures.title: Environmental Fines
disclosures.description: Monetary value of significant fines for non-compliance with environmental laws and regulations incurred by company

disclosures.title: Environmental Non-Monetary Sanctions
disclosures.description: Number of non-monetary sanctions for non-compliance with environmental laws and regulations incurred by company

title: Supplier Environmental Assessment
description: How company assesses and manages the environmental performance of its suppliers. Screening processes, supplier audits, and actions taken when suppliers do not meet environmental criteria.

disclosures.title: Environmental Screening of New suppliers
disclosures.description: New suppliers screened using environmental criteria

disclosures.title: Negative environmental impacts in the supply chain and actions taken
disclosures.description: Suppliers assessed for environmental impacts

title: Employment
description: Company's practices regarding hiring, employee retention, and benefits. New employee hires, turnover rates, employment benefits, parental leave.

disclosures.title: New employee hires and employee turnover
disclosures.description: Total number and rate of new employee hires during the reporting period

disclosures.title: Employee benefits
disclosures.description: Standard benefits for full-time employees

disclosures.title: Parental leave
disclosures.description: Employees entitled to parental leave

title: Occupational Health and Safety
description: How company protects the health, safety, and well-being of its workers. Occupational health programs, hazard identification processes, accident/injury rates.

disclosures.title: Occupational health and safety management systems
disclosures.description: Statement of whether occupational health and safety management system has been implemented

disclosures.title: Hazard identification, risk assessment, and incident investigation
disclosures.description: Processes used to identify work-related hazards and assess risks on a routine and non-routine basis

disclosures.title: Occupational health services
disclosures.description: Occupational health services' functions that contribute to identification and elimination of hazards and minimization of risks

disclosures.title: Worker training on occupational health and safety
disclosures.description: Occupational health and safety training provided to workers, including generic training as well as training on specific work-related hazards, hazardous activities, or hazardous situations

title: Training and Education
description: Company's employee and career development initiatives. Training programs for skill enhancement and performance evaluation.

disclosures.title: Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs
disclosures.description: Training programs for skill enhancement and performance evaluation

title: Diversity and Equal Opportunity
description: Company's workforce and governance bodies diversity, in terms of age, gender, and minority representation. Equal opportunity and fairness in the workplace.

disclosures.title: Diversity of governance bodies and employees
disclosures.description: Company's workforce and governance bodies diversity, in terms of age, gender, and minority representation

disclosures.title: Ratio of basic salary and remuneration of women to men
disclosures.description: Ratio of the basic salary and remuneration of women to men

title: Local Communities
description: Company's engagement with local communities, especially around operations with significant local impact. Company's contributions to local development.

disclosures.title: Operations with local community engagement
disclosures.description: Company's local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

title: Public Policy
description: Company's interactions with government and influence in public policy. Political contributions, lobbying expenditures, and memberships in industry associations.

disclosures.title: Political contributions
disclosures.description: Company's influence in politics, contributions to lobbying, advocacy and law

title: Customer Health and Safety
description: How company ensures that its products and services do not pose health or safety risks to users. Product safety testing, customer feedback channels, recalls, and compliance with regulations.

disclosures.title: Assessment of the health and safety impacts of product and service categories
disclosures.description: Company ensures that its products and services do not pose health or safety risks to users

title: Customer Privacy
description: How an company protects personal data and privacy. Policies and systems for data security, and ethical data governance.

disclosures.title: Substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data
disclosures.description: Protection of personal data and data security
